user_input: Please create hourly demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use Hydrogen as the carrier. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Use Germany.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Generate hourly demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios by processing the 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' scenario data for the years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050 in Germany.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, process scenario data for demand profiles using the specified NT, NT_HE, and NT_LE data for the years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050 in Germany.

tasks.description: Add a new energy carrier object 'Hydrogen' into the PLEXOS model.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user scenario, ensure the Hydrogen energy carrier is properly added to the model.

tasks.description: Split the nodes in the model to isolate the Germany subset.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Select and isolate nodes corresponding to the Germany region based on the provided scenario details.
